title: Decorative sword (white)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The decorative sword (white) can be bought in the Castle Wars area south of the Observatory for 50 Castle wars tickets from Lanthus. The sword offers the same stats as a mithril longsword, and requires level 20 Attack to wield. Also, it has similar shape and colour palette to the blurite sword. However, the blurite sword is considerably weaker.

Item ID4503

The decorative sword (white) can be bought in the Castle Wars area south of the Observatory for 50 Castle wars tickets from Lanthus. The sword offers the same stats as a mithril longsword, and requires level 20 Attack to wield. Also, it has similar shape and colour palette to the blurite sword. However, the blurite sword is considerably weaker.

This item can be stored in the armour case of a costume room.
